entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanikiluaq Airport 07:00 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: S 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow late this morning and this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 late this morning then northwest 40 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High minus 2. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 05 May 2016
